fields.name: Tour du Mont Blanc
fields.header_paragraph: Discover a world of unique and impressive high mountains with a breath-taking show of summits and glaciers everywhere. The Mont Blanc range is fascinatingly beautiful, like a diamond, from every angle.
fields.overview_paragraph_1: This is a 8 day and 165 Km journey with lots of ups and downs...to be specific, almost 10,000 meters of elevation gain. Remember, this is the Alps, rocky and steep terrain, high alpine meadows, glaciers, peaks, streams, lakes and amazing scenery. The route takes us from Chamonix - France through Italy, Switzerland, and back to Chamonix.
fields.overview_paragraph_2: This journey is fully supported with luggage transfers so you will only need to carry a day running pack, shuttles to and from Geneva airport, all accommodations and meals. The accommodation varies from mountain huts to hotels. Some of the huts only offer dormitories, in the hotel it will be twin rooms. Single occupancy is available for an additional cost. The Tour du Mont Blanc (TMB) is one of the most famous trail running and hiking routes and a dream for many trail runners around the world.
fields.overview_paragraph_3: The path encircles Western Europe’s highest peak, and it combines inspiring mountain scenery with cultural vibrancy in the alpine regions of France, Switzerland and Italy. The tour is challenging, rewarding and enjoyable, there will be long and steep runs but still time to relax, to recover and to have a beer or two in the afternoon. The alps and the TMB is a challenging route, but you’ll run and hike with a light vest and in the company of an experienced International Mountain Leader (UIMLA) that will be with you all the time.

fields.name: Azores
fields.header_paragraph: Spectacular trail running adventure as we journey to the Azores. We’ll cross the island via the ancient Whalers Great Route and the 10 Volcanoes trails, heading through lush forests, volcanic beaches and majestic scenery every step of the way.
fields.overview_paragraph_1: On our fully serviced small group running adventure, we head to the spectacular Azores where we’ll split our time between two idyllic islands located in the middle of the North Atlantic Ocean.
fields.overview_paragraph_2: We base ourselves on the pretty island of Faial where we’ll be running a range of wonderful trails. It’s an action-packed seven-day program where no two days will be the same. We’ll be making a crossing of the island of Faial as we follow the ancient Whalers Great Route, as well as the 10 Volcanoes trails.
fields.overview_paragraph_3: Aside from running, we have a day set aside for us to hike a 10km trail which takes us to the summit of the mighty Mount Pico which is located on a neighbouring island that shares the same name with an afternoon spent out on the water whale watching. To give ourselves a break from running we also have a full day of mountain biking which gives us scope to explore some other curious parts of this wonderful island.

fields.name: Faroe Islands
fields.header_paragraph: 5 day trail and mountain running in the picturesque Faroes Islands in autumn
fields.overview_paragraph_1: Faroes Islands are unspoiled, unexplored and unbelievable destination for all trail runners who enjoy running up hills and mountains, along cliffs and through small fishing villages. Among places visited is Gásadalur, a small picturesque village which offers unparalelled view of the fjord and the surrounding islets. Until recently the only way to get to charming Gásadalur was on foot from another village and over the mountain.
fields.overview_paragraph_2: Fell running up the Slættaratindur, the highest mountain in the Faroe Islands (882m), we get a grand view of the Faroese archipelago. From here we get a good view over surrounding mountains and islands and the whole of Eysturoy (eastern island).

fields.name: Italian Dolomites
fields.overview_paragraph_1: Take the high route this summer in the incredible Italian Dolomites in the northeastern corner of Italy. The Italian Dolomites, a UNESCO World Heritage Site since 2009, have been described by the explorer Reinhold Messner as “the most beautiful mountains in the world.” On this hut-to-hut  runcation, or trail running/hiking adventure, we'll crest the impressionable rock spires, mountain passes, and descend through alpine meadows along the famous Alta Via 1 along some of the most beautiful trails in the world.
fields.overview_paragraph_2: Along the way, we'll take respite from the trail in scenic and comfortable staffed mountain lodges, or rifugios, which offer warm lodges, scenic vistas, and four-course Italian dinners as well as a full bar and beverage list. On this guided trail running tour, our hut-to-hut adventure ensures that we'll be waking up and falling asleep to spectacular mountain sunrises and sunsets by sleeping up high at the foot of these impressive mountains.
fields.overview_paragraph_3: This retreat adventure is open to ages 15 and up of any pace. Must be able to complete 8-15 miles/day of hiking/running at altitude, including 2,000-6,000 feet of elevation gain per day.

fields.header_paragraph: Spectacular trail running adventure as we journey to the Julian Alps. We’ll cross the island via the ancient Whalers Great Route and the 10 Volcanoes trails, heading through lush forests, volcanic beaches and majestic scenery every step of the way.

fields.name: Male T-Shirt Orange
fields.description: Lightweight and compressive arm sleeves for optimised thermoregulation during the toughest of trail races. The seamless microfibre is exceptionally soft and fits likes a second skin, eliminating chafing and quickly wicking away sweat as the kilometres wear on.

fields.name: Men Sweatshirt Yellow
fields.description: Lightweight sweatshirt for a modern urban lifestyle, casual design, easy care, fast-drying, holds its shape, environmentally-friendly blend of materials. It has a simple design of fallen seams on the shoulder that avoid those annoying chafing with the backpack.

fields.name: Unisex Hoodie White
fields.description: This hoodie is made with polyester, cotton, and fleece so it offers great softness, breathability, elasticity, and comfort. It comes with raglan sleeves that give more freedom of movement and kangaroo pocket. It has an elastic rib on the cuffs and hem and the hood features an adjustable drawstring. It´s made using BCI cotton, which helps to make global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in and better for the sector’s future.
